channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Major Exchanges to Close Jan. 9 to Honor Death of Jimmy Carter
item.description: The exchanges separately said that their equity and options markets would be closed next Thursday for a national day of mourning.

item.title: Gold Futures Fall on Low Holiday Trading, Higher Dollar
item.description: Gold futures fell, but prices remained trading in a relatively narrow range on low holiday volumes.

item.title: Nasdaq Composite Leads Indexes Lower in Tech Pullback
item.description: U.S. stocks dropped as many investors were likely trimming risk from their portfolios and locking in gains for the year.

item.title: 100% stocks for retirement? A new study says dump the 60/40 portfolio and target-date funds.
item.description: An all-equity portfolio, with a focus on international stocks, could be the key to maximizing retirement wealth, research suggests.

item.title: This New Year, Resolve to Take a WSJ Challenge
item.description: Sign up for one of our email challenges to start your year.

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Extend Gains
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures pressed higher on forecasts for more lasting cold in January across key consumption regions.

item.title: Warren Buffett stocks for your IRA in 2025
item.description: These picks look even more interesting than Berkshire Hathaway

item.title: ‘He ended up homeless and penniless’: My uncle conned my father into signing over their mother’s house. What can I do?
item.description: “His brother went to the prison where my dad was incarcerated and had him sign over the house.”

item.title: Boeing’s bonds are again showing more confidence than the stock
item.description: Boeing Co.’s stock was down Monday after a deadly crash in South Korea, but its bonds were holding up.

item.title: Don’t compare your retirement investments to the S&P 500
item.description: Retirement is about maximizing reliable cash flow for life
